content.rendered:
Experience our

Cafe

Introduction of Cafeteria

Kings Club Cafeteria is Bangalore’s favorite comfort & eclectic urban Cafeteria offering scrumptious multi-cuisine with a classic flair. It is popular for its amazing ambiance. This authentic Cafeteria has carefully curated live music that will make you to visit this place again. The modest interior portrays the voguish & contemporary art and culture.
Welcoming staff, amazing ambiance, great food, and lighting are the main features of the Kings Club Cafeteria. It is decorated with traditional paintings, beautiful art work, & lamps that reflect a dynamic look. The main highlight of Kings Club Cafeteria is that it is swimming pool facing which is the prime spot for a sit-down meal of South, North, Chinese, Sea Food, Tandoori & Nati Style, Pizzas, Fresh Juices, Coffee, and Tea & Milk.
It is the perfect place for anyone with a sweet tooth. A variety of indoor games are also available at Kings Club for you to enjoy with your friends. The smell of mouth-watering meals from the kitchen gives a lively look to the place making it stand out amongst the multitude of Cafeteria in Bangalore. The popular dishes are created with a twist to comfort of a home-cooked meal. Kings Club Cafeteria is open for lunches, dinners, brunch, & late night weekend dining.

Features & Amenities

Kings Club Cafeteria is well-known for its flair for services. Here are the features of Kings Club Cafeteria:
  • A stay in amazing Cafeteria is always a special time for our guests/members.
  • It features all the amenities and services coupled with gorgeous attraction
  • Unique feel-at-home atmosphere.
  • You can also find an extensive choice of desserts that add to the overall dining experience.
  • Quality food
  • Great service at an affordable price point.

Amenities

Here are the amenities of Kings Club Cafeteria:
  • Private entrance with dedicated elevator
  • Outdoor and indoor spaces
  • Retractable roof structures
  • Large Screen TVs
  • State of the Art Sound & AV system
  • Dance Lights
  • Live music

Types of Foods

Kings Club Cafeteria is an all-day amazing venue that serves tempting multi-cuisine. Pick from a blend of Italian, South, North, Chinese, Sea Food, Tandoori & Nati Style, Pizzas, Fresh Juices, Coffee, and Tea & Milk & many more. You will find vegetarian, non-vegetarian dishes & a lot more tempting dishes. We offer delights that will fascinate the taste buds & leave them craving for more with our extensive array of food & beverage choices.

Types of Events You Can Host

Kings Club Cafeteria is the perfect venue for luncheons, corporate meetings, social gatherings, birthday parties, holiday parties, & many more. You can celebrate any of your small events. Kings Club Cafeteria with plentiful space set out a significant venue for hosting any event in refined surroundings, blessed with heavenly aromas.

Birthday party

Social gatherings

Corporate Meetings

Gallery

Testimonials
